verbose_text: Therefore, in order to investigate the function of ROS mediated autophagy in LicA induced apoptosis for HCCs, HCCs were cotreated with LicA and NAC or treated with LicA alone, the cell death ratio and cell viability ratio were detected, LicA can induced cell death and decrease cell viability in HCCs, and NAC can enhance the effect of LicA in killing HCCs (XREF_FIG).
